mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cp.files_directory AS id ,c1.active ,cp.files_directory_parent AS filesDirectoryParentId ,c1.owner AS ownerId ,c1.updated_user AS updatedUser ,GROUP_CONCAT(c2.id) filesDirectoryGroups ,GROUP_CONCAT(c2.`name` ORDER BY cp.`level` SEPARATOR '>') AS pathName ,c1.name AS name FROM files_directory_path cp LEFT JOIN files_directory AS c1 ON (cp.files_directory = c1.id) LEFT JOIN files_directory AS c2 ON (cp.files_directory_parent = c2.id) GROUP BY cp.files_directory ORDER BY cp.files_directory ) AS filesDirectory

SELECT cp.files_directory AS id ,c1.active ,c1.files_directory_parent AS filesDirectoryParentId ,c1.owner AS ownerId ,c1.updated_user AS updatedUser ,c2.id directoryPath ,c2.name directoryPathName ,c1.name AS name ,c1.file_size AS fileSize FROM files_directory_path cp LEFT JOIN files_directory AS c1 ON (cp.files_directory = c1.id) LEFT JOIN files_directory AS c2 ON (cp.files_directory_parent = c2.id)
mapper.select: WHERE cp.files_directory = #{id} AND c1.owner = #{ownerId} ORDER BY cp.level
